title: Mobile/ iOS Developer
jobDescription:
• We are seeking a Mobile/iOS Developer with 5+ years of experience in Swift to join our team.
Responsibilities:
  • 5+ years developing high quality iOS apps.
  • Good experience of writing Swift.
  • Design and build applications for the iOS platform (iPhone & iPad)
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
  • Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
  • Help maintain code quality, organization.
  • Experience in using Xcode.
  • Experience of working with GIT.
  • Familiarity with continuous integration.
  • Experience of XCTest, to a high code coverage level.
  • Solid understanding of the full iOS development life cycle.
  • Commitment to high standards with clean, well-crafted code, and performant user interfaces.
  • Experience of working with Agile methodologies.
  • Knowledge of common design patterns.
  • Good to Have Requirements:
  • Experience in Android/Kotlin and Android Studio is a plus.
  • Must have Soft Skills:
  • Strong communication skills, both verbal and written.
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Excellent collaboration and teamwork skills.
  • Strong adaptability.
  • Strong willingness to learn new technologies.

title: iOS and Angular Developer
jobDescription:
We are seeking a talented and motivated PHP Developer to join our dynamic team, should know how to operate XCode, how to take builds for iOS Apps which are Developed in Angular.


Preferred Skills:
  • Looking experience in mobile app development using the Ionic framework 4+
  • Strong proficiency in web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Excellent knowledge of Cordova CLI
  • Excellent knowledge of Angular and TypeScript
  • Experience with RESTful APIs and asynchronous programming
  • Familiarity with mobile app testing and debugging tools
  • Problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a collaborative team environment
  • Understanding of mobile app design principles and user experience (UI/UX)
  • Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git)
  • Ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly
  • Experience with building and publishing apps to app stores (Google Play Store, Apple App Store)
  • Familiarity with other mobile app development frameworks (e.g., React Native)
  • Knowledge of hybrid app development best practices
  • Experience with backend technologies and API integration
Key Responsibilities:
  • Develop and maintain mobile applications using the Ionic framework
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features and enhancements
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of mobile applications
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues, bugs, and performance bottlenecks
  • Optimise the application for maximum speed and scalability
  • Keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices in mobile app development
  • Implement security and data protection measures within the applications
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members
  • Test and deploy applications on both iOS and Android platforms

title: React Native Mobile Developer
tagsAndSkills: css,ux,software testing,sqlite,android,android studio,react native,mobile application development
jobDescription:
ILEXICON is looking for React Native Mobile Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • As a React Native Mobile Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms
  • Your primary focus will be on building user interfaces and ensuring the performance and responsiveness of the applications
  • You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and backend developers, to deliver seamless and user-friendly mobile experiences

Responsibilities:

  • Mobile App Development:Develop and maintain mobile applications using React Native
  • Write clean and maintainable code to implement new features and enhance existing functionality
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
  • UI/UX Design:Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces
  • Translate design specifications into high-quality code
  • Cross-functional Collaboration:Work closely with backend developers to integrate front-end logic with server-side components
  • Collaborate with product managers and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver features accordingly
  • Code Reviews and Testing:Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality, maintainability, and adherence to coding standards
  • Write unit tests and perform testing to identify and fix bugs
  • Optimization:Identify and address performance bottlenecks and optimize application performance
  • Stay updated on industry best practices and technologies to continuously improve development processes

title: Mobile Engineer / Developer
jobDescription:
• Position Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Mobile Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in .NET MAUI, API development in .NET, and relational database development. As a Mobile Engineer, you will be responsible for the development, and maintenance of our mobile applications, ensuring they are robust, scalable, and performant.

Key Responsibilities:

Mobile Development:

  • Create mobile experiences for users using the .NET MAUI technology stack.
  • Strong experience with responsive native mobile app development.
  • Knowledge of build and deploy processes for iOS and Android app stores.

API Development:

  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable APIs using .NET.
  • Collaborate with front-end and back-end developers to integrate APIs with mobile applications.
  • Ensure APIs are secure, efficient, and well-documented.

Database Development:

  • Design and maintain queries to support mobile application functionalities.
  • Optimize database query performance and ensure data integrity.

Collaboration and Communication:

  • Work closely with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to define project requirements and deliverables.
  • Participate in agile development processes, including sprint planning and daily stand-ups.
  • Communicate progress, challenges, and solutions effectively to the team and management.

Innovation and Improvement:

  • Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies in mobile development and .NET.
  • Continuously seek ways to improve development processes and product quality.
  • Propose and implement innovative solutions to enhance user experience and application performance.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of experience in mobile application development, with a focus on .NET MAUI or Xamarin.
  • Proven experience in developing and maintaining APIs using .NET.
  • Strong expertise in relational database design and development.
  • Experience leading a team of developers and managing development projects.
  • Proficient in C#, SQL, and other relevant technologies.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Experience with agile development methodologies.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with cloud services (e.g., Azure, AWS) and DevOps practices.
  • Knowledge of front-end technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks.
